name: openedx-plugin-slots-browser
description: Browse all frontend plugins available in the Open edX ecosystem

scripts.collect: npm run collect:plugins && npm run collect:filters && npm run collect:events
scripts.collect:all: npm run collect:plugins && npm run collect:filters && npm run collect:events && npm run collect:releases && npm run sync:data
scripts.sync:data: cp data/plugin-slots.json src/data/plugin-slots.json && cp data/filters.json src/data/filters.json && cp data/events.json src/data/events.json && (cp data/releases.json src/data/releases.json 2>/dev/null || true) && (cp -r data/releases src/data 2>/dev/null || true) && (rm -rf src/data/releases/releases 2>/dev/null || true)
